Глагол

малевать

грязнить
['grime', 'soil', 'mess', 'daub', 'puddle', 'smutch']
LanguageYouLearnExplanation:
Глагол
coat or smear (a surface) with a thick or sticky substance in a carelessly rough or liberal way.
she daubed her face with night cream
Имя Существительное
plaster, clay, or another substance used for coating a surface, especially when mixed with straw and applied to laths or wattles to form a wall.
square huts, mostly daub and wattle
a painting executed without much skill.

Глагол

['merit', 'work']
быть достойным
['merit', 'deserve', 'live up to']
LanguageYouLearnExplanation:
Имя Существительное
the quality of being particularly good or worthy, especially so as to deserve praise or reward.
composers of outstanding merit
Глагол
deserve or be worthy of (something, especially reward, punishment, or attention).
the results have been encouraging enough to merit further investigation

YourLanguageExplanation:
Наречие
особенно
['special', 'especially', 'particularly', 'notably', 'specifically', 'peculiarly']

лично
['personally', 'individually', 'particularly', 'bodily', 'peculiarly', "in one's own person"]
LanguageYouLearnExplanation:
Наречие
more than usually; especially.
some patients were peculiarly difficult to cure
oddly.
the town is peculiarly built
used to emphasize restriction to an individual or group.
a manner peculiarly his own

LanguageYouLearnExplanation:
Глагол
get rid of by throwing away or giving or selling to someone else.
people now have substantial assets to dispose of after their death
bring (someone) into a particular frame of mind.
prolactin is released, disposing you toward sleep
arrange in a particular position.
the chief disposed his attendants in a circle

Имя Прилагательное
not easily bent or changed in shape; rigid.

severe or strong.
they face stiff fines and a possible jail sentence
full of.

a dead body.
Глагол

I want to get those pigs who stiffed your doctor

the quality of forming a unified whole.
the group began to lose coherence and the artists took separate directions
